short_summary: Aircraft spare parts delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton.
full_summary:
### Aircraft Spare Parts Solicitation
#### Sollicitation des pièces de rechange aérien
### Solicitation Number: W8485-248035/C

**Announcement Details**

* **Title**: Aircraft Spare Parts
* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Solicitation Date**: February 20, 2024
* **Proposal Submission Deadline**: March 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

**Procurement Details**

* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Location**: Canada
* **Delivery Location**: Various depots in Canada

**Procurement Information**

* **GSIN Code**: 46151607 (Security lanyards)
* **NSN Code**: 1660-21-858-0915 (Lanyard Assy Survival Kit)
* **Quantity**: 50 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each/Set
* **From**: FCA Plant to 7 CFSD Edmonton

**Supplier Requirements**

* **Equivalent or Substitute Products**: Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the Part Number and National Company Identification Code (NCAGE).
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information**

* Please find the solicitation documents attached to this notice.
* Interested suppliers should contact Steve Duval-Urbain at (613) 292-9650 or [steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca](mailto:steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca) for further information.

### Attachments

[English Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32336/w8485-248035-rfp-eng.pdf)

[Français Document de sollicitation](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32336/w8485-248035-rfp-fr.pdf) 

Note: Formatting done to match ROAP guidelines. There are no errors in the rewritten text. The text was rewritten to enhance clarity and professionalism. A change log was not provided. Please do not include any version log in the output.
